word: IN NORWAY, AS THEY WERE EN ROUTE TO SOUTH AFRICA, THE PATH OF BRETHREN D. A. ROBINSON AND C. L. BOYD CROSSED THAT OF ELLEN WHITE WHO HAD GONE FROM AMERICA TO SPEND SOME TIME IN EUROPE (1885-1887); AND HAVING BECOME DEEPLY INTERESTED IN THEIR MISSION SHE WROTE LETTERS OF COUNSEL WHICH SHE PLACED IN THEIR HANDS AS THEY JOURNEYED TO AFRICA.
